resources.string: “God won’t give you all the answers at once, but He will never forsake you.” -President Richards-
“Sometimes God steps aside just enough to let you learn what He wants you to in this life.” -President Richards-
“When God speaks, you move your feet.” -President Richards-
"You might not totally understand where to go after this; but Trust God . His dealings are prepared" -President Richards-
"It is what we do with our challenges that really matter" -Kathy Skene-
"Reach out to your Father in Heaven so He can show you what to learn" -Kathy Skene-
“If you hold on, the Light will come.” -Justin Jones-
“The Prophets and Apostles are not out of touch, but in tune!” -Paul Cardall-
"The talents in which we hold have the ability to build bridges between people, nations, faiths, and shed the Gospel throughout the world." -Paul Cardall-
"You cannot escape or run from God's love. The Savior Will find you." -Paul Cardall-
" You accepted to be on the Lord's Staff" -Paul Cardall-
"When you realize what He did for you, it changes what you think and feel for the Savior." - Paul Cardall-
" Never let a day go by, that you do not call upon the Lord" -Camille Fronk Olson-
"What ever level of faith you have now, won't be sufficient for what lies ahead, keep building daily" (Kim Clark) -Camille Fronk Olson-
"As much as you have inquired, you have been directed, and that is why you are where you are right now" -Camille Fronk Olson-
"The commandment to “be not weary” is exceptional to your spiritual growth." -Matthew Eyring-
"Don't get frustrated sometimes all we can see is one step at a time" -Matthew Eyring-
"Train your minds and hands to be instruments” -Matthew Eyring-
"You've merely forgotten what you already know" -Sister Wixom-
"After much soul searching you'll understand your true desires and what you want to be" -Sister Wixom-
"You become what your daily priorities give you time for" -Sister Wixom-
“No matter what circumstance you are in; good, bad, a slave or a pharaoh, find opportunities to serve and be salty!” -Sharon Eubank-
"Ye are the salt of the earth. Salt brings out the flavor. Salty people bring out the Good in all aspects" -Sharon Eubank-
“If there is one way to describe the Spirit, it is: Alive!” -Janine Green-
“I have learned of myself that we are never out of His reach!” -Janine Green-
“Everything, including our trials, points us to the Savior” -Janine Green-
"The Stories of Jesus are really true stories. What are your stories of Jesus" -Janine Green-
“When we change our behavior to meet our goals, that is accomplishment. However, when we change our goals to accept our behavior, that is called rationalization.” -Chuck Coonradt-
"In the absence of clearly defined goals, we are forced to concentrate on activity and ultimately become enslaved by it” -Chuck Coonradt-
“Don’t take wooden nickels from anyone.” -Elder Clark-
“Our Heavenly Parents are as close to us as they can be." -President Richards-
"There is nothing you can do to yourself that destroys your worth” -President Richards-
